title: Foebreaker
content:
Enchantment +2

Main Hand OnlyTenacity: When you miss an attack, you deal Bludgeoning damage anyway.

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

As heavy and opposed to nonsense as the wearied hammer of a sentencing magistrate.

Foebreaker is one of the Maul Weapons in Baldur's Gate 3. Foebreaker is a deadly maul that ignores bludgeoning resistance, great in a situation where an enemy resists your blows. In BG3, each type of weapon has different ranges, damages, and other features (Finesse, Ve
